DOC.brief_summary: The Respiratory Insufficiency Outcome (RIO) project consists in a french multicenter prospective cohort of patients with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) undergoing domiciliary noninvasive positive pressure ventilation.
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Cohort of Respiratory Insufficiency Outcome
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis of COPD domiciliary noninvasive ventilation noninvasive ventilation set up for a neuromuscular disease
